item.title: A Deep Dive into my chess.com games
item.description: Since I created an account on chess.com in 2020, I have played an unhealthy amount of games on the website and all my games are saved in their database. The trail of data I have created over the years should contain huge secrets of my own gameplay, but the stats I see on my profile are too basic and do not offer useful plans to improve. If I could to decipher more from the data of my games, I could get potential insights into my strengths and weaknesses.

item.title: Setting up linode Arch Linux
item.description: Blindly run these steps once you have a brand new Arch Linux Server in linode. Connect to your Linode via SSH: ssh root@IP Set your timezone and synchronize the hardware clock with the system clock: ln -sf /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Calcutta /etc/localtime hwclock --systohc date Create a new user and set sudo permissions: useradd -m pdebashis passwd pdebashis export EDITOR="vim" visudo --- add the line "pdebashis ALL=(ALL) ALL" Switch to the newly created user

item.title: First Over the Board Chess Tournament
item.description: This was my first OTB experience. The tournament was - “DreamHack Rapid and Blitz”, organized by NODWIN Gaming, Samay Raina and ChessBase India. It was a 9RD Swiss, G/15+10 time control for Rapid and was open to all. The prize fund was around Rs.10 lakh and the entry fee at Rs.1299. It was held on 4th and 5th of Novemeber, 2022 in the Hitex Exhibition Centre in Hyderabad. Tournament Details - https://chess-results.

item.title: Insurance Fraud
item.description: Me and my mom, were once approached by 2 insurance agents from bajaj Finance at our home. We had some funds lying with them which they were suggesting to move around. We let them go ahead with these processes. Then she was asked for options on how to invest this amount. We were not interested for anything other than a FD and since Bajaj Finance already had some other FDs for us, we agreed to park this money as well with them.

item.title: Competitive Programming memories from University
item.description: Looking back on the days in college where I felt very elated - happy and confident solving programming challenges as a sport. NMPC was one of the contests, abbreviated from NIST Monthly Programming Contest. It was introduced in my third year at college and was organized only 3 times in 2 years even though the name indicated otherwise. The Sankalp coding contest on the other hand, was an yearly contest and was organized without fail.

item.title: Why Resign and then come back
item.description: We don’t really appreciate what we have until it’s gone. I was having a good time in my first company and I expected any place I go to, to have the same standards and satisfaction of work. Reality is often dissapointing. I joined a company out in an older part of Bangalore that was a marketing analysis/telecom campaigning organisation. item.title: Monitoring Hadoop
item.description: A Hadoop ecosystem requires vigorous monitoring to identify any abnormality and prevent major downtimes. Major Hadoop service providers, provide their own tools for monitoring. But for a standalone hadoop, the monitoring aspect is an open field, and you can use your own tools and scripts to setup a monitoring framework. Here, lets try to setup a basic script based monitoring capability with essential indicators Uptime Monitoring Identify each process type running on each cluster.
